body:
lil_greg15 (Old main): I came up with lil_greg15 because my irl name is Gregory, My Birthday is may 15 and my father has the same name so that makes me a Jr. and that's where lil came from. That's who I came up with lil_greg15.

GrapeSmoothie (New main): I really like grape smoothies for some reason and so I thought it would be a cool username and so that's why I changed my main to it. Not that much of a story behind this name.

NovemberFlame: Back when I use to build on a server that had creative, the person that owned the plot next to me was named "NovemberPanic", I was a great friend of that person and I didn't have enough time to get their skype before the server shut down forever (2 years ago)and so I order to remember her I named my alt NovemberFlame. 

OrangeSmoothie: Same story with GrapeSmoothie except I really didn't like my old name for this account (Synq_) and so the second I had the chance to change it I did. I got a few friends to vote on a name and OrangeSmoothie was a runner-up winner and so this is my other alt accounts name. *Cough Cough Blame FrostedCupcakez & Frozen Solstice Cough Cough*

Biased: Why not this username? its funny af xD



So that's the story behind my accounts..... Whats yours?

replies.body:
From my very old AMA:
"How did I get my username? Oh boy, that's a question that I expected but I knew would be a long story. You better be prepared. 
First things first, I've always loved dairy products such as milk and cheese, and I have no idea why.
Now, the story starts when I was randomly searching Kongregate for Multiplayer games. After a while, I found a game titled "Realm of the Mad God." I took a look at it, didn't think much of it, and then stopped.
Later, I picked up the game again, and got addicted. At that time, there was a professional guild known as "Mafia" that played this game. They later changed the guild to "Cream."
Fast forward a few months, and I started getting bored of the game. My birthday was coming up in a few months, and I had heard of Minecraft being the new "thing," so I decided to get that for my birthday. I decided to come up with a good name. I thought of Cream because of the professional guild and also because of my love of dairy products, but I found out Cream was taken.
So, I thought, "what's cream made out of again? Right, milk." So I tried CreamMilk. Didn't work. Finally, I went with MilkCream.
And that's the story of my name!"

replies.body:
iBiZa_TwisT is a well known gamer who is the best in the world at a franchise named Uncharted, and he inspired me to play the third instalment of this series, which I played multiplayer on for 18 months straight and flipping loved it (on the ps3) and the only reason I stopped playing it is because I got a PS4 and am now part of a clan on Call of Duty and are part of things in other games, so I had to move on.

Anyway, I took iBiZa's first name and put Minecraft on the end of it.

My kills on Uncharted 3 are 22145 for 13698 deaths (bearing in mind it was my first shooting game) which is good, but iBiZa's stats are still going up, and are around 350k for 80k, which is astonishing.

replies.body: Well, Aslan is- as many of you probably already know- the lion in the Narnia series. <--- my mother used to read these to me every night growing up before she passed away...so yeah. And also, 73 is the smallest factor of the first composite generalized Fermat number in base 10 (104 + 1 = 10,001 = 73 × 137). <---That is actually super cool. Haha..I'm a math dork :D So yup, that's the history behind my username!

Ok So In minecraft, I consider myself a pretty good sniper/marksman. I thought about saying "ShamrockSniper_" But I thought it didn't sound as cool as "spectre." A spectre is basically like sniper or someone whom no one can see killing people. I added "shamrock" in front because I thought a sniper needs to have luck, to have the right precision to take a shot. instead of putting something boring like "Lucky," I associated my name with "shamrock" because I liked how it sounded. replies.body:
I guess I should explain my name :p
I think it was 2012 when I bought my account, however I had previously played on my brother's account. At that time, there was this popular white girl saying that goes like "I refuse to sink". The quote is often associated with an anchor. It represents that there is some hope to hold on to, and that I won't let obstacles get in my way. Basically, I won't give up no matter how hard it gets.
boom.
